p.k: Lola has to play a violin solo during the big show tonight. When she is on stage, Victor creates an accident as a pretext to make Lola believe the place is haunted. A series of mysterious mishaps occur one after the other, and to cap it all Lola’s violin disappears. Pat soon finds out that Victor is behind the story and that the Guanos stole Lola’s violin to lure Hoodie into a trap. Pat has to go soloist to save the day!
